author: Special Correspondent
text:
A group of farmers staged a dharna in front of the Oil and Natural Gas Comisssion’s plant at Kidarankondan on Saturday protesting against exploration by the ONGC in the delta districts.

Led by Selvakumar, a local farmer, they said the exploration activity by the ONGC had done more harm than good to farmers.

Farmers from Alivalam, Adiyakkamangalam, Srinivasapuram, and Karuppur participated in the agitation. They wanted the ONGC to desist from exploration activity in the delta.
title: Farmers protest against ONGC
